titleStmt.title: A serious & seasonable warning unto all people occasioned by two most dangerous epistles to a late book of John Falldoe's, subscribed by Richard Baxter [and 24 others] brethren all ---- in iniquity ... whose slanders and lyes against the holy people called Quakers are hereby reproved / by C.P.
titleStmt.author: Pusey, Caleb, 1650?-1727.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Friends' Library (London, England)
